item.title: 台积电利润超预期，人工智能需求强劲再现
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（TSMC）以强劲的利润增长超出预期，这印证了美国芯片设计公司对人工智能硬件需求的乐观预期。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. surpassed expectations with strong profit growth, supporting bullish indications from US chip designers about AI hardware demand.】

item.title: 印尼央行加入全球央行阵营支持美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 印度尼西亚央行加入全球央行阵营，公开支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔，成为东南亚首个公开表态支持的美联储主席的货币当局。【原文：Bank Indonesia joined a group of global central banks in throwing its support behind Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, becoming the first monetary authority in Southeast Asia to publicly do so.】

item.title: LIV高尔夫在与PGA巡回赛的50亿美元较量中节节败退
item.description: 由沙特支持的LIV高尔夫有限公司举办的首届赛事，于三年前半在伦敦北部某乡村俱乐部开杆。冠军将获得475万美元奖金，创职业高尔夫赛事最高奖金纪录。交通标志警示着大批球迷将堵塞道路。【原文：The first tournament from Saudi-backed LIV Golf Ltd. teed off more than three and a half years ago at a country club in North London. The winner would bank $4.75 million, the largest payday in pro golf history. Traffic signs warned of throngs of fans clogging the roads.】

item.title: 美国高校国际学生人数多年后首次下降
item.description: 在特朗普政府收紧移民政策并针对多所顶尖学府采取行动后，今年秋季美国高校的外国学生入学人数出现三年来首次下滑。【原文：Foreign student enrollment at US universities fell this fall for the first time in three years after the Trump administration clamped down on immigration and took aim at a bevy of elite schools.】

item.title: 新兴市场支付服务商Dlocal计划进军亚洲市场
item.description: 支付服务提供商DLocal Ltd今年正深化其在亚洲主要市场的业务布局，计划招聘数十名员工，包括一名高级管理人员。该公司首席执行官佩德罗·阿恩特在接受采访时透露了这一计划。【原文：Payment services provider DLocal Ltd is deepening its presence this year in key Asian markets where it operates with a plan to make dozens of hires, including a senior figure, Chief Executive Officer Pedro Arnt said in an interview.】

item.title: 赞比亚领跑非洲股市反弹，其股票在全球排名第二
item.description: 赞比亚股市今年成为全球表现最佳的两大股市之一，这得益于铜价创下历史新高以及经济增长加速的预期。【原文：Zambia’s stock market is one of the world’s top two performers this year, powered by record high copper prices and expectations of faster economic growth.】

item.title: 2025年上半年英国非法体育流媒体观看量激增33%
item.description: 英国非法体育直播正呈激增态势，其背后推手是大量依靠无牌照博彩运营商广告资助的网站。球迷们为规避正规平台不断上涨的订阅费用，纷纷转向这些非法渠道。【原文：Illegal sports streaming is surging in the UK, fueled by sites that are largely funded by advertising from unlicensed gambling operators, as fans seek to dodge rising subscription costs on legitimate platforms.】

item.title: 中国对保证金交易的审查瞄准科技股推高股市泡沫
item.description: 中国意外收紧融资融券业务，凸显出监管机构在抑制市场泡沫的同时，仍需支持对创新科技企业的投资，这种平衡举措面临的挑战。【原文：China’s unexpected tightening of margin financing highlights the balancing act regulators face in curbing market froth while still supporting investment in its innovative technology firms.】

item.title: 莫桑比克总统称该国将在新国际货币基金组织计划后启动债务谈判
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔·查波表示，该国将在与国际货币基金组织就新计划达成协议后，才开始与债权人进行债务重组谈判。【原文：Mozambique will only start talks with creditors to renegotiate its debt after reaching an agreement on a new program with the International Monetary Fund, President Daniel Chapo said.】

item.title: 油轮运费飙升，美国对委内瑞拉施压重塑石油运输格局
item.description: 华盛顿对委内瑞拉的干预正引发航运市场剧变，随着更多石油可能出口至美国的前景浮现，该地区油轮运费已攀升至近两年来的最高水平。【原文：The shipping market is being shaken up by Washington’s intervention in Venezuela, as the prospect of more oil being exported to the US boosts regional tanker rates to their highest level in almost two years.】

item.title: 特朗普暂缓制裁，伊朗石油风险未消
item.description:
该国给地缘政治格局带来的威胁远比委内瑞拉更甚。【原文：

The country is bringing far more danger to the geopolitical table than Venezuela.

】

item.title: 韩元交易员在贝森特涨势后试探当局决心
item.description: 周四，韩元汇率再度下挫，逼近17年低点，尽管美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特发表了支持性言论，但这仍考验着官员们遏制汇率下跌的决心。【原文：The South Korean won resumed its decline toward a 17‑year low on Thursday, testing officials’ resolve to stem the slide despite supportive remarks from US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 移民官员突袭Meta数据中心，逮捕司机
item.description: 据当地执法部门称，联邦移民官员突击检查了路易斯安那州乡村地区的一处建筑工地，该工地由Meta Platforms公司建造其最大的数据中心，此次行动导致两人被捕。【原文：Federal immigration officers targeted a construction site in rural Louisiana where Meta Platforms Inc. is building its largest data center, leading to the arrest of two individuals, according to local law enforcement.】

item.title: 镍价在飙升后趋稳，因印尼警告铁矿石供应将减少
item.description: 镍价在主要生产国印尼暗示产量可能下降后，维持在2024年中期以来的最高水平附近。【原文：Nickel steadied near the highest level since mid-2024 after top producer Indonesia signaled a potential drop in output.】

item.title: Treasury Wine因美国业务面临新风险创一个月最大跌幅
item.description: 因有报道称美国分销商可能出售其业务，可能进一步扰乱该公司本已举步维艰的美国业务，Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.股价创下一个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Treasury Wine Estates Ltd. shares fell the most in a month after reports that an American distributor may sell its operations raised the prospect of further disruption to the company’s already struggling US business.】

item.title: 中国饮料制造商东乐饮料据悉正评估在香港上市的兴趣，拟募资逾十亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国功能饮料制造商东乐饮料集团已开始评估投资者对在香港二次上市的兴趣，此次上市可能筹集逾10亿美元资金。【原文：Chinese energy-drink maker Eastroc Beverage Group Co. has started gauging investor interest for a second listing in Hong Kong that may raise more than $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 参议院委员会推迟加密货币市场结构法案审议
item.description: 参议院银行委员会推迟了对备受期待的加密货币市场结构法案的讨论，此前数小时，交易所Coinbase Global Inc.撤回了对最新版本的支持。【原文：The Senate Banking Committee has delayed its discussion of the much-anticipated crypto market-structure bill, hours after exchange Coinbase Global Inc. pulled its support for the latest version.】

item.title: 汇丰、保诚注资2.2亿美元支持香港WeLab
item.description: 香港金融科技公司威立有限公司（WeLab Ltd.）完成最大规模融资，获汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）和保诚香港有限公司（Prudential Hong Kong Ltd.）等投资者注资2.2亿美元。【原文：Hong Kong-based fintech firm WeLab Ltd. has secured $220 million from investors including HSBC Holdings Plc and Prudential Hong Kong Ltd. in its largest round of funding.】

item.title: 力拓与嘉能可的超级合并能否成功？
item.description:
本期播客聚焦：为何矿业界梦寐以求的超级合并有望成为现实

【原文：

On this week’s podcast: Why the mining industry’s dream mega-merger could become reality

item.title: 《环球时报》称特朗普对华芯片政策"具有歧视性"
item.description: 中国官方媒体驳斥了特朗普政府对英伟达公司向中国出售高端芯片所设条件属于"歧视性"行为，而美国正逐步解除对该亚洲国家实施的实质性出口禁令。【原文：Chinese state media has dismissed the Trump administration’s conditions on the sale of Nvidia Corp.’s high-end chips to China as “discriminatory,” as the US moves closer to reversing an effective ban on their exports to the Asian country.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴迈出重要一步，将淘宝购物与核心AI应用程序相连接
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司计划将其旗舰在线购物和旅游服务与人工智能应用程序相连接，这是该公司迄今为止为将Qwen打造为面向消费者的综合人工智能平台所迈出的最大一步。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. plans to link its flagship online shopping and travel services to its AI app, taking its biggest step yet to build Qwen into its one-stop artificial intelligence platform for consumers.】

item.title: 亚马逊猛烈抨击萨克斯融资协议，称其股权“毫无价值”
item.description: 亚马逊公司正对萨克斯全球企业申请破产保护提出质疑，称这家奢侈品零售商违反了在亚马逊网站销售萨克斯产品的协议，且其对这家现已破产企业的股权投资"推定为无价值"。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is challenging Saks Global Enterprises’ foray into Chapter 11, saying the luxury retailer breached a deal related to the sale of Saks products on its website and that its equity investment in the now bankrupt business is “presumptively worthless.”】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商SpacemiT获得8600万美元新一轮融资
item.description: 中国芯片公司SpacemiT在最新融资轮中筹集逾6亿元人民币（约合8600万美元），用于加速产品商业化进程并拓展业务规模。【原文：Chinese chip company SpacemiT raised more than 600 million yuan ($86 million) in a fresh funding round to speed up commercialization of its products and expand its business.】

item.title: OpenAI从Mira Murati的人工智能初创公司挖角三名员工
item.description: OpenAI已从Thinking Machines Lab（由前OpenAI首席技术官Mira Murati领导的人工智能初创公司）聘请了三名员工。【原文：OpenAI has hired three staffers from Thinking Machines Lab, the artificial intelligence startup led by former OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格坚挺与疲软的中国需求难以调和
item.description: 铁矿石今年开局强劲的态势，持续凸显了许多观察人士所认为的市场定价与实际情况之间持续存在的错位现象。【原文：Iron ore’s robust start to the year continues to highlight what many observers deem to be a persistent mismatch between market pricing and conditions on the ground.】

item.title: 快手筹集20亿美元离岸债券融资用于人工智能
item.description: 快手科技启动其首次境外债券发行营销，旨在为人工智能业务筹集资金，延续了去年该领域大型企业全球发债的热潮。【原文：Kuaishou Technology began marketing its maiden offshore bond offering as it looks to bolster funding for artificial intelligence, extending last year’s wave of global debt sales by major companies in the sector.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注日元可能跌至165关口前遭遇干预
item.description: 对冲基金无视日元干预警告，在货币期权市场押注日元兑美元汇率可能跌至165左右，才会引发日本当局出手干预。【原文：Hedge funds are ignoring yen intervention warnings and wagering in the currency option markets that it may fall toward 165 to a dollar before Japanese authorities step in.】

item.title: 日本在野党谋合并 紧急选举临近
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，日本最大在野党与前执政联盟伙伴正就深化合作展开磋商，以期在即将举行的选举中加强协作，并考虑未来合并的可能性。【原文：Japan’s largest opposition party and a former ruling coalition partner are in discussions to cooperate more deeply in an upcoming election, with an eye on a potential merger, according to local media.】

item.title: 韩国央行维持利率不变，因担忧韩元疲软及房地产市场复苏
item.description: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，此举符合市场普遍预期。当局正密切关注韩元贬值态势，同时警惕持续升温的房地产市场引发金融失衡的风险。【原文：South Korea’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged in a widely expected move, as authorities monitor the weakening won along with risks of financial imbalances stemming from a persistent property market rally.】

item.title: 对冲基金重燃阿根廷GDP挂钩证券争议
item.description: 奥瑞利斯资本管理公司及其他对冲基金集团重新提起诉讼，要求阿根廷支付与该国经济表现挂钩的证券款项。【原文：Aurelius Capital Management and a group of other hedge funds renewed a lawsuit against Argentina seeking payments on securities tied to the performance of the South American nation’s economy.】
